questions.quote: Oh, thank you.  Wow, I've never seen this before..  Oh, they're letters.  Here.
Oh, Elaine. You know the way I am â€“ rarely ever thinking of myself. My only concern is the welfare and happiness of those close to me. Sure, it hurts sometimes to give, and give, and give...
Really! You know, a lot of restaurants are serving brewed decaf now, too.
All right, Elaine but this is beyond news. This is like Pearl Harbor. Or the Kennedy assassination. It's like not even news. It's total shock.
All right. So let me ask you a question. Who was the man in the cape?
Oh!! Let me ask you a question. Was the movie part of the bet?
All right Miss Benes. This doesn't look to serious. You'll be fine.
Well, Mr. Kramer, your list of short cuts is most impressive.
And who doesn't serve cake after a meal? What kind of people? Would it kill them to put out a pound cake? Something!
What?...Oh! by the way. What am I going to be in the wedding party?
